attributes.action: For year 11 and 13 summer exams to be cancelled.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government and parliament to discuss this as year 11 and 13s have not been in school enough due to the pandemic for these exams to take place. They are also expected by the government to fail these exams which is ruining their chances of getting into university with high grades , which is then affecting their future which is totally outrageous and disgustingly unfair for them to be put in this position.
attributes.background: We want all year 11 and 13 summer exams to be cancelled and replaced with predicted grades or assessments in England and Wales.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597282
